problems.title: Maximum Length Of Repeated Subarray (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, return the maximum length of a subarray that appears in both arrays.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and m (lengths of nums1 and nums2).
Second line: n space-separated integers (nums1).
Third line: m space-separated integers (nums2).

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum length.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
